entries.name: COMPONENT
entries.desc: An Array of the available components for URI::LDAP.

entries.name: DEFAULT_PORT
entries.desc: A Default port of 389 for URI::LDAP.

entries.name: SCOPE
entries.desc:
Scopes available for the starting point.

SCOPE_BASE - the Base DN

SCOPE_ONE  - one level under the Base DN, not including the base DN and not
including any entries under this

SCOPE_SUB  - subtrees, all entries at all levels

entries.name: build(args)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI::LDAP object from components, with syntax checking.

entries.name: new(*arg)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI::LDAP object from generic URI components as per RFC 2396. No LDAP-specific syntax checking is performed.

entries.name: hierarchical?()
entries.desc: Checks if URI has a path. For URI::LDAP this will return false.
